title: Manilow's Minestrone
directions: Heat olive oil in a large soup pot, and saute onion and garlic until transparent and lightly browned. Add carrots, bell pepper, cabbage, celery, thyme, and oregano, and saute another 3-4 minutes. Stir in soy sauce and water, tomatoes, cooked beans, zucchini, sea salt, and black pepper, and simmer 20-25 minutes. Add pasta and chopped parsley just before serving. Serves 6-8.
ingredients: 28 oz. can chopped or crushed peeled tomatoes
